Articles.Content:
This is my first actually good VTOL! It isn't that fast due to only being able to put one turbojet on the back end, it uses 2 VTOL thrusters, and is VERY stable! I've even flown it with a joystick and was able to land it!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

It looks almost nothing like the F-35 really, but hey, I tried! Don't judge me >:3

Download: http://www./download/0ddqck5go0angu9/F-35+VTOL.craft

EDIT: For those of you wondering how I painted the craft and my kerbals suits, the suits are a mod called Universe Replacer and they are custom suits, the craft paint is done with KerbPaint. NOTE: None of these mods add parts, just painting and suits.

Edited November 22, 2014 by Kozak
